metaData.title: Unique experiences in Roșia Montană, Transylvania
metaData.text: We are located in Roșia Montana, Carpathian Mountains, Transylvania, an area with mountains, valleys and lakes, but also with a rich culture and history because of the patrimony built by various civilizations that came here since antiquity to extract gold. To discover them we offer guided tours and there are also marked trails.

imageVideoTextButtons.text: Unique experiences in Roșia Montană, Transylvania

content.text: We are located in Roșia Montana, Carpathian Mountains, Transylvania, an area with mountains, valleys and lakes, but also with a rich culture and history because of the patrimony built by various civilizations that came here since antiquity to extract gold - see bellow some experiences to discover our area.

heading.subtitle: Have a walk among the old buildings

content.text: In the historic center of the oldest documented settlement in Romania, Rosia Montana year 131, are several patrimony buildings (churches and cemeteries belonging to 5 different confessions, goldsmith houses, stamp mills, former lofts, old cemeteries or mining exhibits. content.text: Rosia Montana has one of the largest underground gold mining system in the world, a 120km labyrinth underneath the earth made of roman, dacian or habsburgic galleries proposed as UNESCO site. To visit them we organize

heading.subtitle: Discover the communism period

content.text: Discover the mining megaprojects of the communism: open pits, huge wasting lakes, tools and and indutrial buildings, see their impact upon the nature and the price we paid to obtain the precious metals. Near us is the Roșia Poieni (the bigest open pit of Europe), the wasting lake Geamăna (that sunken 2 villages) and open pit Cetate. We do
to these objectives, but you have to make an early
as we need to make a request to the mining institution to let us visit.

heading.subtitle: Where and why started 'The Save Rosia Montana' campaign

content.text: Visit the places where during 15 years were protests and manifestations against the Canadian mining company who wanted to open a big gold mining using cyanide to extract the gold that was left. There were huge street protests in Romania and abroad against this project. To see where and how the 'Save Rosia Montana' campaign has started, how are looking the places that should have been impacted by the canadian project and the community impact, we organize
of the 'Save Rosia Montana' campaign.

images.text: Eugene’s farm - the place where multiple actions towards saving Rosia Montana have been initiated. Sculptures are made by a Paris NGO - find out more about their story on the site
Țarină - the place where the environment and activism festival took place - FânFest

heading.subtitle: Hiking to the Nature’s Monuments - marked trails

content.text: Hiking in the nature, fresh air or bike rides? Come and discover the Rosia Montana massifs where are various natural sites perfect for hiking or biking. From the historic center are starting 4 marked trails of different difficulty levels and time (3h, 5h or 8h).

images.text: Raven Stone - natural reservation. Here are the oldest galleries in Rosia Montana, made by the agatârși using only water and fire.
Sphinx - the cross was placed by the miners to have luck while searching for gold.
The tight peak of Sulei Massif.
Stalagmites of the former gold galleries.

heading.subtitle: The lakes (calm and relaxing spots)

content.text: Over 100 lakes were built during the Habsburg period to help processing the gold but today are only 7 left. To visit them follow the 'Lake trail' (marked with blue dot - 4h hiking) that starts from the historic center of Rosia Montana.

images.text: Țarinii Lake - a little mountain lake with a wonderful view especially during the autumn
Big Lake or Hearth Lake (due to his heart shape).
Pine lake - the house belongs to a painter who use the view as inspiration for his work.

content.text: Places on the top of the village with amazing views, nature and fresh air. Rosia Montana is amazing from every angle so start your adventure on the road less of our area.

heading.subtitle: To the basalt roof of the Carpathian mountains - Detunata

content.text: This 80m high massive is a protected area with huge basalt columns through which small glaciers appear occasionally. The area has great legends, the people are welcoming and they also make some amazing cheese pies. To discover follow the Red Cross - 3h marked trail that starts near our house.

images.text: Hike to the basalt roof - Detunata
The view from Detunata - towards the 'Motilor' land.
Detunata - the basalt sea (the view from the top).

heading.subtitle: Free air museum - Hay houses

content.text: Unfortunately most of the villages from our area were abandoned because the youngsters moved to the cities, but the good thing is that some buildings remained preserved exactly as they were a few decades or even hundreds of years ago. Among these are the houses and the stables covered with hay specific to our area or the small wooden churches. A tour of these objectives is like a journey back in time. On request we also organize
to these areas.

heading.subtitle: Near by is the Scărișoara Glacier

content.text: Situated in the heart of the Apuseni mountains, here is the biggest underground glacier in the world and is the first cave in Romania to be classified as natural monument. It is situated 1h away by car

heading.subtitle: The best spot in May - The daffodils meadow

content.text: The daffodils are blooming in May in a meadow near Rosia Montana, the smell and the beautiful landscape from here is something that you will never forget. To reach it will go 1h by car + 30min by foot (we organize
in every weekend of May to this meadow so make an early

heading.subtitle: Hiking to Vulcan massif

content.text: The Vulcan massif is a former volcano that erupted 2 millions years ago. The most interesting fact it's is convex shape that can be observed oance you are on the top of it. You can get here by bike (3h) or by car (45min) followed by a 1h hike.

Vulcan Massif.

heading.subtitle: Live as a local farmer

content.text: We put you in touch with the local farmers from our area where you can take part to their daily works, easy to learn (hand cow milking, local food and drinks making, the traditional haymaking which will be used in the winter for the animals). Your help would be really helpful for the farmers and for you will be an unique experience as you will be connected to the nature and will learn traditional crafts very well preserved in our area. content.text: New and amazing landscapes are coming out during the winter, the old houses covered by snow, perfect places for sleigh rides and the village roads becomes perfect places for an easy walk in a snowy morning.

heading.subtitle: Come in a guided tour

content.text: The local stories really matters and Rosia Montana has a golden past. How the gold mining worked through galleries, watter mills, pounds and open pits, the past of the patrimony buildings from the historic center, the proposed UNESCO area or the impact of the mega mining project proposed here by the canadian company and the massive protests against it are just a few reasons why we recommend to visit Roșia Montana with a guide. If you are interested in participating to a guided tour in our area please specify while making a

content.text: We are located in an area with hills, valleys and unpaved roads between mountain villages perfect for cycling. We offer mountain bikes for rent or guided tours on bikes. See below some of the tracks you can do here:

heading.subtitle: A delicious walk

content.text: Depending upon the season, our area offers various goodies directly from the source. If you come in May or June will find strawberries and fir buds in Jully or August raspberry, cranberries, blackberry or mushrooms, so have a hike on the sounding massifs where you can find and pick forest fruits or mushrooms.

images.text: Have a break in a Raspberry meadow.
The blackberry meadow.

content.text: Near us is a mountain club specialized in archery that offers beginner or advanced courses in archery for adults or children. They have different types of arcs and an archery field. If you want to participate to such clases please specify while making a
